metadata.displayName: Deployment prefix
metadata.description: Provide a prefix (max 10 characters, unique at tenant-scope) for subscription resources created as part of this deploy.

metadata.displayName: Deployment Unique Id
metadata.description: Autogenerated ID to identify each deploy.

metadata.displayName: Azure Security Center Email Contact
metadata.description: Email address to get email notifications from Azure Security Center

metadata.displayName: Enable CIS Microsoft Azure Foundations Benchmark initiative
metadata.description: If 'Yes', ARM will assign the CIS Microsoft Azure Foundations Benchmark initiative to the subscription. If 'No', it will be skipped

metadata.displayName: Data retention (days)
metadata.description: Select data retention (days) for Log Analytics.

metadata.displayName: Enable logs
metadata.description: If 'Yes', ARM will enable logs stream to the log analytics workspace. If 'No', they will be disabled

metadata.displayName: Deploy Hub-spoke network topology
metadata.description: If 'Yes', ARM will deploy hub-spoke network topology to the subscription. If 'No', it will be skipped

metadata.displayName: Enables DDoS Protection plan
metadata.description: If 'Yes', DDoS Protection plan will be applied to spokes with ingress traffic. If 'No', it will be skipped

metadata.displayName: IP address prefix for the hub network
Subnet prefix for the gateway for hub
Subnet prefix for Azure Firewall for hub
Subnet prefix for Azure Bastion for hub
IP address prefix for the spoke one network
Subnet prefix for the workload for spoke one
Deploy application gateway in spoke one
metadata.description: If 'Yes', ARM will deploy an application gateway in spoke one. If 'No', it will be skipped

metadata.displayName: Subnet prefix for the application gateway for spoke one
Availability Zones for the Azure Application Gateway for spoke one
IP address prefix for the spoke two network
Subnet prefix for the workload for spoke two
Deploy application gateway in spoke two
metadata.description: If 'Yes', ARM will deploy an application gateway in spoke two. If 'No', it will be skipped

metadata.displayName: Subnet prefix for the application gateway for spoke two
Availability Zones for the Azure Application Gateway for spoke two
Availability Zones for the Azure Firewall

properties.displayName: Enable Azure Defender for App Service
properties.description: This policy enables Azure Defender for App Service.

properties.displayName: Enable Azure Defender for Azure Resource Manager (ARM)
properties.description: This policy enables Azure Defender for Azure Resource Manager (ARM).

properties.displayName: Enable Azure Defender for Container Registry
properties.description: This policy enables Azure Defender for Container Registry
This policy enables Azure Defender for DNS.
This policy enables Azure Defender for Servers.

properties.displayName: Enable Azure Defender for Azure SQL Database
properties.description: This policy enables Azure Defender for Azure SQL Database.

properties.displayName: Enable Azure Defender for SQL Servers on machines
properties.description: This policy enables Azure Defender for SQL Servers on machines.

properties.displayName: Enable Azure Defender for Storage Accounts
properties.description: This policy enables Azure Defender for Storage Accounts
This policy enables security alerts notifications

metadata.displayName: Security contacts email address
metadata.description: Provide email address for Azure Security Center contact details

properties.description: Enforce activity log to be sent to the log workspace
Enforce Azure Security Center to be enabled and configured for the subscription
